title: The Vanishing Heirloom
solution: The family butler orchestrated the theft to pay off gambling debts, but accidentally misplaced the heirloom in the process.

clues.description: A window in the study was found unlocked, but showed no signs of forced entry.
The security camera footage for the night of the theft is missing 30 minutes.
A note demanding money was found in the butler's quarters, signed by a local loan shark.
The family dog, usually aggressive towards strangers, was oddly calm on the night of the theft.

plotTwist.description: The heirloom is discovered in the manor's old dumbwaiter shaft
plotTwist.revealTrigger: Investigators hear an odd echoing sound when questioning staff near the kitchen.
